messages.subject: RK Parody Sumo wrestlers (music vid)
messages.msgSnippet: speaking of sumo wrestlers... Member: Mindbud on animemusicvideos.org http://www.animemusicvideos.org/members/members_videoinfo.php? v=18951 make an Kenshin
messages.messageBody:
speaking of sumo wrestlers...
Member: Mindbud on animemusicvideos.org
http://www.animemusicvideos.org/members/members_videoinfo.php?
v=18951
make an Kenshin public service announcement for a more tolerant
Japan...very funny:)

I wish PMK did a flashback or something about the Shinsengumi, under
Serizawa Kamo, vs. the sumo wrestlers...knowing PMK the writers
would've made it funny.

messages.subject: Book recommendation
messages.msgSnippet: I borrowed a book yesterday that has some nice portraits and still photography from Japan circa 1854--1905 It s called Japan Photographs 1854-1906 edited by
messages.messageBody:
I borrowed a book yesterday that has some nice portraits and still
photography from Japan circa 1854--1905
It's called Japan Photographs 1854-1906
edited by Clark Worswick
isbn 039450836X

While most of the photos seem similar to ones in the Nagasaki University
online archives there are a few surprises such as this little gem for
those here who have a certain hentai fundoshi fixation *glances to Phil
& Miss Behavin*

*smirk*

http://shinsengumihq.com/fundoshi.htm



--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
